Reviews.Title: “DREAM COME TRUE”
Reviews.Author: plumbarius
Reviews.Content: hotel absolutely charming world charm feel venice staff extremely helpful delightful clean comfortable feeling time mention location close tell wife truly enjoyed stay

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, good location, quiet rooms”
Reviews.Author: Jurkovic
Reviews.Content: time stay giglio hotel close piazza san marco quiet conected vaporetto surrounded restaurants shopping hotel charming welcoming helpful staff breakfast simple fair

Reviews.Title: “Favorite hotel on our Italy trip! Amazing service, great location, so comfy!”
Reviews.Author: TriGirlD
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 hotels october visit italy hotel venice reasons loved 1 easy stop grand canal vaporetto youre complicated walks venice alleys minutes st marks square accessible 2 italy decent bed clean closet space nice bathroom nice patio deck sat night drinking wine 3 customer service little perks staff friendly experienced helped included palazzo del giglio slippers free wifi brought complimentary bottle champagne night additionally checked bach cd listened drove throughout tuscany breakfast draw basic husband enjoyed served fresh croissants nutella various spreads coffee cappuccino overall cant beat hotel venice amazingly priced location absolutely stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel but.........”
Reviews.Author: RJGGJR
Reviews.Content: palazzo del giglio sold 4star hotel nice comfortable spend days venice fine wasnt facilities drink glass provided air conditioning beginning october advised time booking heating regardless weather bedroom warm night sleep windows resulted partner providing mosquitoes venice perfect meal nights trot hotel management didnt understand provide machine plugin didnt disappointing

Reviews.Title: “A gem set in the heart of Venice”
Reviews.Author: brutus02
Reviews.Content: exquisite hotel sits gritti surprising ago served apartment facility guests famous hotel required space peace thats exactly giglio offers twelve ive destination times time ive found welcome service varies hotel book water taxi driver phones desk porter awaiting vaporetto stop serves sm vaporetto 1 stops route taking lido rialto railway station campo quiet inside 5 minutes centre san marco 5 minutes wooden accademia bridge leisurely noise bustle stay superb apartment hotel

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location and very friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: nat_library
Reviews.Content: atmospheric hotel ideally situated near piazza san marco surrounded restaurants shopping quiet vaporetto water taxi access hotel slightly fashioned found charming welcoming staff helpful friendly breakfast simple faced onto laneway rear quiet front facing square preferable happily stay hotel

HotelInfo.Name: Palazzo del Giglio
HotelInfo.Address: 2462 San Marco | Campo Santa Maria del Giglio, 30124 Venice, Italy
